title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
description:
Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

Coinbase (COIN) stock could see significant downside this year, according to analysts at JPMorgan. Meanwhile, blockchain research platform Arkham Intelligence reportedly identified the on-chain Bitcoin (BTC) addresses of several U.S. spot BTC exchange-traded funds (ETF), and U.S. lawmakers are pressing Mark Zuckerberg’s Meta about whether it plans to use any of its five blockchain and crypto-related trademark filings. 

JPMorgan has downgraded the stock of crypto exchange Coinbase, citing Bitcoin’s dismal price action since the approval of nine spot exchange-traded funds.

In a note to investors, the bank’s analysts said Coinbase’s stock has limited upside and downgraded it to “neutral.” JPmorgan maintained its year-end price target of $80 for COIN. It’s currently trading around $124, suggesting downside potential of more than 35%.

Read more

title: Iris Energy Boosts Bitcoin Mining Capacity to 6 EH/s, Eyes 20 EH/s Milestone by H2 2024
description: According to an announcement from the publicly-listed bitcoin miner Iris Energy, the mining operation has increased its operating capacity to 6 exahash per second (EH/s) and expects an additional 4 EH/s to be online by the first half of 2024. Iris Boosts Mining Capacity to 6 EH/s Amidst IREN Share Dip ​​The announcement on Tuesday […]

title: Binance Coin Price Prediction 2024-2033: Is BNB Ready for the Bull Run?
description: Binance Coin Price Prediction 2024-2033 After notable changes in its executive team, Binance has shown notable resilience and prospects for recovery. The departure of Changpeng Zhao, Binance’s CEO, who was also embroiled in legal challenges, initially caused a decline in the value of Binance Coin (BNB). Despite this initial setback, the cryptocurrency has shown a […]

title: Swiss regulator FINMA approves Taurus for retail offering of tokenized securities
description: Swiss cryptocurrency custody and trading firm Taurus has received approval from the Swiss financial regulator FINMA to offer blockchain-based shares in unlisted companies to retail investors. This move aims to bring tokenized securities to a broader audience and democratize access to digital assets. Taurus’ TDX marketplace: Enabling wider participation Taurus, with the backing of Deutsche […]

title: Scammers target investors with coordinated phishing emails
description: In a recent cybersecurity incident, scammers targeted major Web3 companies, including Cointelegraph, WalletConnect, and Token Terminal, in a hacking and phishing attack. The attackers allegedly exploited vulnerabilities in the email service provider MailerLite, leading to the theft of over $580,000 from unsuspecting victims. Investors lose $580,000 to scammers in phishing attacks Cryptocurrency investigator ZachXBT highlighted […]

title: GAMEE platform suffers a heavy hack attack
description: Gamee, a blockchain gaming project supported by Animoca Brands, recently faced a security breach on its Gamee token (GMEE) contracts hosted on the Polygon network. The unauthorized access occurred on a Tuesday, resulting in the theft of a substantial 600 million tokens around 6:31 p.m. UTC. Gamee disclosed the incident in a detailed post, outlining […]

title: Sen. Lummis: Crypto not the problem, bad actors are
description: Discord regarding Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies persists between U.S. lawmakers after a year of growth for global adoption and the coming of spot BTC ETFs.

title: Polymer Labs raises $23m for blockchain interoperability network
description: Today, Polymer Labs secured $23 million in funding for its Series A round to help develop a modular layer 2 network.

title: Coinbase faces headwinds as Bitcoin and ETF interest dips, says JPMorgan
description: Coinbase may face challenges due to decreasing Bitcoin values and declining interest in Bitcoin ETFs, as per insights from JPMorgan Chase & Co.

title: Polygon’s DePIN Revolution: From Mobile Networks to Edge Computing
description: DePIN projects on Polygon use blockchain to revolutionize internet infrastructure, from connected cars to GPS accuracy. XNET, a blockchain-powered mobile network, aims to bridge the digital divide with a revenue-sharing model. title: Innovative Competitor to Tether (USDT) and Circle’s USDC Stablecoin: Figure Technologies Seeks SEC Approval for Groundbreaking Interest-Bearing Stablecoin
description: Figure Technologies aims to become the first to introduce an interest-bearing stablecoin in the US. Figure Markets, the digital asset arm of Figure, also plans to secure $50 million in funding for its operations, signaling the company’s strategic focus on advancing digital asset initiatives. title: Avalanche Foundation Defines 2024 Memecoins Investment Strategy
description: Avalanche Foundation sets rigorous criteria for investment in memecoins, prioritizing security and fair distribution on the Avalanche blockchain. With clear quantitative thresholds, Avalanche aims for a balanced memecoins market and a responsible investment approach. The Avalanche Foundation, known for powering the Avalanche blockchain, has marked a before and after in the crypto industry by announcing [...]
